bibl.title: Realistic Portraiture in Greece and Egypt. A Portrait Bust of Ptolemy I.
bibl.note: Baltimore, Walters Art Gallery, Inv. 54.598. Bronze bust of Ptolemy I as Dionysos. H. 11 cm. Tarentum (?), ca. 300 B.C. - The portrait is a landmark in the development of ancient portraiture. Brief outline of its history.
Segall Berta, Realistic Portraiture in Greece and Egypt. A Portrait Bust of Ptolemy I.
